Text: Up to 85% of your benefits may be taxable if you are single and earn more than $34,000 or if you are married and earn more than $44,000.
Cause: you are single and earn more than $34,000 or if you are married and earn more than $44,000.
Effect: Up to 85% of your benefits may be taxable
Sentence: <e2>Up to 85% of your benefits may be taxable</e2> if <e1>you are single and earn more than $34,000 or if you are married and earn more than $44,000.</e1>
